accepted_if: :Other 為 :value 时，:attribute 必須接受。
after_or_equal: :Attribute 必須要等於 :date 或更晚。
alpha_dash: :Attribute 只能以字母、數字、連接線(-)及底線(_)組成。
alpha_num: :Attribute 只能以字母及數字組成。

are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_team: Are you sure you want to delete this team?
are_you_sure_you_want_to_leave_team: Are you sure you want to leave this team?
ascii: The :attribute must only contain single-byte alphanumeric characters and symbols.
before_or_equal: :Attribute 必須要等於 :date 或更早。
between.array: :Attribute: 必須有 :min 至 :max 個項目。
between.file: :Attribute 必須介乎 :min 至 :max KB 之間。
between.numeric: :Attribute 必須介乎 :min 至 :max 之間。
between.string: :Attribute 必須介乎 :min 至 :max 個字符之間。
confirmed: :Attribute 確認欄位的輸入並不相符。
country: The :attribute field is not a valid country.
declined_if: 當 :other 為 :value 時，:attribute 必須被拒絕。
digits_between: :Attribute 必須介乎 :min 至 :max 位數字。
doesnt_end_with: The :attribute may not end with one of the following: :values.
doesnt_start_with: The :attribute may not start with one of the following: :values.
email: :Attribute 必須是有效的電郵地址。
ends_with: :Attribute 結尾必須包含下列之一：:values。
gte.array: :Attribute 必須多於或等於 :value 個項目。
gte.string: :Attribute 必須多於或等於 :value 個字符。
if_you_delete_team_all_data_will_be_dele: If you choose to delete the team all data will be permanently deleted.
in: 所揀選的 :attribute 選項無效。
ip: :Attribute 必須是一個有效的 IP 地址。
ipv4: :Attribute 必須是一個有效的 IPv4 地址。
ipv6: :Attribute 必須是一個有效的 IPv6 地址。
json: :Attribute 必須是正確的 JSON 格式。
looks_like_you_are_not_part_of_team: It looks like you're not part of any team!
lte.array: :Attribute 必須少於或等於 :value 個項目。
lte.string: :Attribute 必須少於或等於 :value 個字符。
mac_address: :Attribute 必須是一個有效的 MAC 地址。
max_digits: The :attribute must not have more than :max digits.
min_digits: The :attribute must have at least :min digits.
missing_if: The :attribute field must be missing when :other is :value.
missing_unless: The :attribute field must be missing unless :other is :value.
missing_with: The :attribute field must be missing when :values is present.
missing_with_all: The :attribute field must be missing when :values are present.
multiple_of: 所揀選的 :attribute 必須為 :value 中的多個。
not_eligible_based_on_current_members_te: You are not eligible for this plan based on your current number of teams / team members.
not_in: 所揀選的 :attribute 選項無效。
password.letters: The :attribute must contain at least one letter.
password.mixed: The :attribute must contain at least one uppercase and one lowercase letter.
password.numbers: The :attribute must contain at least one number.
password.symbols: The :attribute must contain at least one symbol.
password.uncompromised: The given :attribute has appeared in a data leak. Please choose a different :attribute.
plan_allows_no_more_teams: Your current plan doesn't allow you to create more teams
please_upgrade_to_add_more_members: Please upgrade your subscription to add more team members.

relatable: 此 :attribute 可能与此资源不相關聯。
required_if: 當 :other 是 :value 時 :attribute 不能留空。
required_if_accepted: The :attribute field is required when :other is accepted.
required_unless: 當 :other 不是 :values 時 :attribute 不能留空。
required_with: 當 :values 出現時 :attribute 不能留空。
required_with_all: 當 :values 出現時 :attribute 不能留空。
required_without: 當 :values 留空時 :attribute field 不能留空。
required_without_all: 當 :values 都不出現時 :attribute 不能留空。

throttle: 您嘗試的登入次數過多，請在 :seconds 秒後再試。

ulid: The :attribute must be a valid ULID.
